short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A developer tool to locate and copy web element selectors (XPath/CSS/ID). Hover over elements to get their locators instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AnySpy is a powerful Chrome extension designed for developers and QA engineers to quickly capture and copy element locator information. With an intuitive hover-based interaction mechanism, it helps you easily identify and extract XPath, CSS Selectors, and IDs from any web element.

Key Features:
✓ Real-time element detection with visual highlighting
✓ One-click copy for XPath, CSS Selector, and ID
✓ Support for elements within iframes
✓ Keyboard shortcuts (Alt+Shift+S to activate)
✓ Clean, modern interface
✓ No data collection, works entirely offline

Perfect for:
• Web developers
• QA engineers
• Test automation engineers
• Web scraping developers
